summary: IN OCTOBER OF THIS YEAR 2018. I BOUGHT A NEW JEEP COMPASS. I COMPLAINT TO THE DEALERSHIP ABOUT. I WAS TOLD THERE NOTHING THEY CAN DO.  EVERY TIME YOU STOP FOR A TRAFFIC LIGHT OR COME UP ON TO A STOP SIGN. THE VEHICLE STALL OUT. WHEN REMOVE YOUR FOOT FROM THE BRAKE. IT WILL RESTART. THIS CAN'T BE GOOD FOR THE STARTER. IT'S ACCIDENT WAITING HAPPEN. THIS IS A SAFETY ISSUE I HAVE WITH THIS VEHICLE. THERE SHOULD BE RECALL ON THIS VEHICLE TO FIX THIS BEFORE THE PEOPLE IN THIS VEHICLE ARE INJURY OR KILL.  WHEN WHAT!!!!  IF YOU READ ALL OF COMPLAINTS ABOUT THIS VEHICLE. THERE ARE 94 COMPLAINTS.
